disp-quote.p: Actually I had a court case in ..., which was exactly on the wrong side of this line. So this was a public health effort where they had an agreement with the hospital to track the transmission process. The hospital uncovered the names of these people to the public health workers. In the end, this became a court case and all these people in this cluster were suing one other person of the cluster because the public health workers didnâ€™t know enough about what can and cannot be done. (#1)
